name: @zesty-io/react-app-loader
description: React component for loading a custom app via the app-sdk

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && NODE_ENV=production babel index.js --out-dir dist --copy-files
scripts.release: npm run build && npm publish --access public
scripts.release:alpha: npm run build && npm publish --tag alpha --access public
